url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Prestige Class NPCs/Mystic Theurge/Mystic Theurges/Celestial Theurge/Traica Kaladon

sections.body: The survivor of a zombie plague that ravaged her small town, Traica now quests to destroy any undead threat.
Allying with paladins, inquisitors, and clerics, Traica works to make the world safe for good people everywhere.
Gracious and kind, Traica is always willing to help the downtrodden.

name: Traica Kaladon
